workshop.title: Cloud Accelerate: DevOps Starter kit
workshop.description: Workshops designed to help you get started with your trial accounts.

labs.title: Home
labs.description: Welcome to Oracle's DevOps Starter Kit

labs.title: Lab 100: Build and Deploy your UI
labs.description: Use Developer Cloud Service to a build and deploy a NodeJS and Oracle JET Application

labs.description: Use Developer Cloud service to build and deploy a Java SE Microservice

labs.title: Lab 300:  Create the Backend
labs.description: Create and Deploy a MySQL database for your application

labs.title: Lab 400: Your Second Microservice
labs.description: Use Developer cloud service to build and deploy a Google Go Microservice
